script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_pledges_secondary_sectors_subsectors CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_secondary_sectors_subsectors AS SELECT afp.id AS pledge_id, v.sectorname, COALESCE(v.amp_sector_id, -999999999) AS amp_sector_id, v.sector_percentage, COALESCE(v.cnt_nulls, 0) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges afp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT afps.pledge_id, COALESCE(rs.name, '#') AS sectorname, aswl.id1 AS amp_sector_id, sum(afps.sector_percentage) AS sector_percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(afps.sector_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_funding_pledges_sector afps JOIN ni_all_sectors_with_levels aswl ON afps.amp_sector_id = aswl.amp_sector_id JOIN all_sectors_with_levels ass ON afps.amp_sector_id = ass.amp_sector_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector rs ON rs.amp_sector_id = aswl.id1 WHERE ass.sector_config_name = 'Secondary' GROUP BY afps.pledge_id, aswl.id1, rs.amp_sector_id ) v ON afp.id = v.pledge_id;
